original_text: formula 51 is so trite that even yu's high-energy action stylings can't break through the stupor .
generated_text:
1. "Fast & Furious 8 is so predictable that even Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson's impressive stunts can't save it from being a snooze-fest."
2. "The Avengers: Endgame is so formulaic that even Marvel's masterful storytelling can't overcome the sense of déjà vu."
3. "Mission: Impossible - Fallout is so tired that even Tom Cruise's death-defying stunts can't inject any excitement into the dull plot."
4. "The Hunger Games: Catching Fire is so unoriginal that even Jennifer Lawrence's strong performance can't elevate the uninspired script."
